activities: FoodLogiq provides a software-as-a-service product to its customers. We collect certain personal information in connection with these services, as detailed in our privacy policy.
personaldata: organization, client, customer, credit card, transaction data.  No manually processed data is currently collected.
recoursemech: Customer complaints are funneled to the company's privacy officer and are fully investigated. Independent dispute resolution through the American Arbitration Association is also an option should the parties not be able to resolve the issues on their own.
